text.text:
Need to broadcast in all 3 buildings:
Cafe, PDSH, Main: 
Our first Remo Reset is coming soon! When this happens, your Remo window will freeze up for 2-3 minutes while we reset Remo. Once Remo is reset, refreshing your browser will bring you back, right where you were. To help you pass this time of uncertainty, here is a joke, in honor of our Australian participants: "What do you call a boomerang that ..."
